# Load libraries
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(janitor)
```

# Import data
```{r}
setwd("~/Intro R/Project R/R-Studio-Workarounds/assignments")

metabric <- read.csv("brca_metabric_clinical_data.csv") %>%
  clean_names()
head(metabric[, 1:5]) 
```

# Create Plot
```{r, warning = FALSE}
ggplot(metabric, aes(x = type_of_breast_surgery,
                     y = tumor_size)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill="lightblue",
               alpha = 1)+
  geom_jitter(fill = "gray",      #added jitter plot to visualize data size
              alpha = 0.1,  # opacity to remove clutter
              position = position_jitter(0.35))+  # width to remove clutter
  #labels
  labs(title = "Reduction of Tumor Size by procedure", #changed tite clearer interprestation
       x = "Type of Procedure", # removed underscore
       y = "Tumor Size")+    # removed underscore
  #themes
  theme_bw() + #cleaner theme
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 18,  #better visualization
                                  face = "bold",
                                  color = "darkblue",
                                  hjust = 0.5))+
  theme(axis.title.y = element_text(size = 18,
                                    face = "bold",
                                    color = "darkblue",
                                    hjust = 0.5))+
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(size = 18,
                                    face = "bold",
                                    color = "darkblue",
                                    hjust = 0.5))+
  theme(legend.position = "none") # removed legend 
```
